question:
A Panchayati Raj Institution at district / intermediate or Village level exists in which of the following states of India? Â 
  1. Mizoram
  2. Nagaland
  3. Meghalaya
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: In Delhi, Meghalaya, Manipur and Nagaland, there does not exist Panchayati Raj institution at any of the three levels. In Daman and Diu & Dadra & Nagar Haveli, it does not exist on intermediate level. In Pondicherry , it does not exist on District level.
